name: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Become the blade that destroys demons!

In solo play mode, walk the path of Tanjiro Kamado and experience the story depicted in the anime ""Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba"" as Tanjiro fights to restore his sister Nezuko's humanity and battle the demon threat!

Play Versus mode, which allows up to 2 players to battle in offline or online 2v2 battles with any combination of characters! With simple controls and exhilarating gameplay, rise up to become the strongest of the Demon Slayers!
